Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>




* Iron Raptor looked over at Prowl as she heard his concern about her injuries, i being expected had lessened the annoyance in which she felt when he had finally said it.
She really didn't care if she was injured but knew that if she didn't go and repair she would then end up getting raged on by Prowl that it was the best thing for her, so there was no real choice other then to give in.
Iron Raptor growled at the fact of being defeated when it was only common sense to be worried about her, but when she heard Striker suggest that they just both get repaired and then meet later it was a bit better of a suggestion.*

" Oh, alright."

* She hated the fact that she was forced to postpone solving Ramhorn's and Plintissa's problem but she really hated to see Prowl worry about her and hated just as much to HEAR him worry, his comments on her needing repair but also not thinking that he needed to as well.
But then to add a bit of a light side to the predicament she decided to cast the pain away from her thought as best she could and force a slight smil...as well as a mock sly look on her face.
She then looked straight at Prowl so he would get the point.*

" But only if we share chambers..."

* The comment was ment as nothing more then a joke to lighten the atmosphere, but if Prowl took it another way...she had no problem with that.*
